style_recommender module¶

style_recommender.get_detected_items(img)[source]¶

Hit the detection model to get all the clothes on an input photo

Parameters:img (Image) – the input image for the object detection model
Returns:
  • i_fns (ndarray) – array with the filenames of the detected items
  • cat_list (ndarray) – array with the categories of the detected items
  • id2cat (ndarray) – a list with all the names of all the categories
style_recommender.get_recommendations(img_fn, cat)[source]¶

Gets the top most similar items from the collection

Parameters:
  • img_fn (str) – the filename of the chosen image
  • cat (int) – the id of the chosen category
Returns:

array with top results
Return type:

ndarray
style_recommender.get_unique_filename()[source]¶

Get a unique file name for storing temporary images

Returns:the path to the file
Return type:str
style_recommender.scale_bbox(bbox, res)[source]¶

Fixes the coordinates order and scales it according to the original size

Parameters:
  • bbox (ndarray) – array with the relative bbox coordinates
  • res ((int,int)) – the width and length of the original image
Returns:

array with the scaled coordinates
Return type:

ndarray
